settings.title: Coming Soon
settings.newsletter_subheading: Subscribe to be the first to hear about our exclusive offers and latest arrivals.

settings.title: CONFIDENCE AT THE BEACH
settings.text: Ruby knows that every girl can feel comfortable and confident at the beach in their RUBIES bikini bottoms.

settings.title: COMFORTABLE IN EVERYTHING
settings.text: RUBIES underwear let's our kids keep doing the activities they love! They can feel great in their leggings, leotards and dresses.

settings.title: DONATE A PAIR TO FAMILIES IN NEED
settings.text: RUBIES has been able to donate over 15% of all bikini bottoms to families all around the world through generous donations from people like you. Every girl should be able to have a bikini bottom no matter what their economic situation.

settings.title: CELEBRATE TRANS AND NON BINARY KIDS  WITH OUR COLOURFUL TEES
settings.text: Spread the word that Every Girl Deserves to Shine with a RUBIES tee. All proceeds go towards donating more swim suits to families in need.

settings.title: SEND A GIFT OF COMFORT AND CONFIDENCE
settings.text: Let's get our trans and non-binary family and friends back into the pool and doing the activities they love.

settings.title: A PERFECT MATCH
settings.text:
This super cute halter bikini top pairs perfectly with RUBIES bikini bottoms.

Tweens and teens can experiment with various levels of shaping .

settings.title: THE BROOKE BRA PRE-ORDER IS HERE
settings.text: Introducing the first ever bra designed specifically for trans girls and non-binary tweens and teens.

settings.title: Find LGBTQ+ Support Near You
settings.text: RUBIES is building the world's largest list of LGBTQ+ Centres and Groups. Find a group near you or submit one for others to discover.

settings.title: Image with text
settings.text: Pair large text with an image to give focus to your chosen product, collection, or blog post. Add details on availability, style, or even provide a review.
